comments: Probably didn't publish a new fern name himself but Asplenium preissmannii is named after him.
examples: Hieracium chlorophyton Preissm. & Zahn in Hayek, Fl. Steiermark, ii. 829 (1914).
source: R.E.G.Pichi Sermolli 1 March 1991. In Mitt. Naturwiss. Vereins Steiermark as "Korrespondierende Mitglieder" until vol. 52:   (1916).
